name: Cultagious
description:
A game about gathering resources, learning new rituals, and summoning undead to survive monsters who try to kill you.

You live in the woods as a cultist with some secret goal he wants to achieve. Will he ever achieve it? Or will he become fuel to those who hate the living?

Controls:
Mouse - to move
Esc - to pause
I - to open inventory
E- to collect and interact

This game is a submission to the GWJ (And Revival Jam after the Admins permission)

This game is still in early development, as a submission to the Revival Jam I will keep updating it each week for the next month if you are liking the game and want to see its future don't forget to comment and maybe even support :)! 

Game by: CursedSoul
Art by: Aly
Music:
